CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 30, 1961, pg. 13, reads: "DI'S Plan Affair - The fabulous DI"s of Pittsburgh are making friends with some of the patients in Children's Hospital, who may benefit from their affair, which will take place at Holiday House in Monroeville, Jan. 28.  The group includes, left to right: Miss Wargo, a nurse; Nellie Barron; Albert Ferguson, president of the Pittsburgh chapter of the National Foundation for Neuromuscular Disease: Margaret Watson and Juanita Drake. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait including D. I. Club  members, from left: Ms Wargo, Nellie Barron, Albert Ferguson, Margaret Watson, and Juanita Drake, standing in room of Children's Hospital around two young boys
